Public Member Functions

 ServerDistributedObject (ServerObjectRepository serverObjectRepository, DistributedObjectId doId)
override void ProcessMessage (Message message)
virtual bool DistributedObjectStateUpdate (out Message outgoingMessage)
 This function is intended to update clients who are first joining a zone / room. The client need to know what the current state of the distributed object is upon joining, so every distributed object must be able to report it's current state to broadcast to all interested client sessions The default implementation is to do nothing. To return false means that the message being generated inside the function is not valid. Subclasses should return true.

Reimplemented in Hangout.Shared.UnitTest.DistributedTestObject, and Hangout.Shared.UnitTest.ServerObjectRepositoryTest.DistributedTestObject.

virtual bool Hangout.Server.ServerDistributedObject.DistributedObjectStateUpdate ( out Message  outgoingMessage  )  [virtual]

This function is intended to update clients who are first joining a zone / room. The client need to know what the current state of the distributed object is upon joining, so every distributed object must be able to report it's current state to broadcast to all interested client sessions The default implementation is to do nothing. To return false means that the message being generated inside the function is not valid. Subclasses should return true.

Parameters:
sessionIds
